operations.content:
version: 1
name: goal_1770610532
description: Stabilize scenario goals/goal_1770610532.yaml
targets:
  - route: /api/v1/stabilize_goal
    method: POST
    parameters:
      - name: goal_id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
    responses:
      '200':
        description: Goal stabilized successfully
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                status:
                  type: string
                  enum: [success]
                message:
                  type: string
